co.paralleluniverse.strands

Interface SuspendableCallable<V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, BasicActor, GenBehaviorActor, GenEventActor, GenServerActor, SupervisorActor, SuspendableUtils.VoidSuspendableCallable

    public interface SuspendableCallable<V>

    This interface can represent any operation that may suspend the currently executing Strand (i.e. thread or fiber). Unlike SuspendableCallable, the operation represented by this interface returns a result. This is just like a Callable, only suspendable.
